duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and manage physician coding process for inpatient and outpatient services.
Compare and review charge tickets to clinical documentation to ensure accurate capture of revenue.
Develop educational materials and policies to assist providers with new regulatory policies.
Identify and implement documentation and revenue enhancement opportunities.
Review and distribute coding related information to clinical staff.
Resolve coding related errors, edits, and denials identified by physician practices.
Participate in education programs to maintain up-to-date coding skills.
Prepare presentations for physician and staff practices as needed.

education_certification.credential: Associates Degree or HS Diploma/GED plus two years of related medical coding experience. CPC certification from accredited institution preferred.
